Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(2) Summary

For an API to directly contribute value to a business, it must be conceived, designed, and managed as a product. With IT becoming increasingly pervasive, we see API products being produced and consumed in more and more places throughout an organization. In this decentralized landscape the question is how to make sure that API products can be produced in a decentralized way, but can still be discovered and used easily. In this session we discuss how the focus of API management increasingly is looking at API consumption as well. We show how to make this work with a model that supports decentralization but at the same time provides a unified catalog of all APIs that makes it easy to discover and use APIs.

API Products Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(7) What is a Product?



API Products Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(8) When is an API an API Product?

  • Conceived with use cases and stories in mind
  • Designed for easy use and potential reuse
  • Managed with a focus (also) on consumption

API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(10) API Management is Evolving

  • API management means different things to different people
  • It has been evolving with the practice and tooling
  • It is growing in scope with the growing importance of APIs


API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(11) Technical API Management



API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(12) Technical API Management Focus

  • Securing APIs against unauthorized access
  • Managing authentication and authorization for API access
  • Protecting APIs with mechanisms such as throttling


API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(13) API Lifecycle Management



API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(14) API Lifecycle Management Focus

  • Looking at APIs as evolving over time
  • Making API development more effective
  • Adding components for tasks such as testing and analytics


API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(15) API Product Management



API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(16) API Product Management Focus

  • Applying a value-oriented perspective to turn APIs into API products
  • Separating API products from their technical management
  • Using product catalogs to allow for diverse landscapes


API Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): API Lifecycle Management in Practice: Managing APIs as Products

(19) Building Blocks are Driving Value

  • Actively market building blocks that can drive value
  • Manage the building block portfolio
  • Provide specific building blocks for specific audiences
